page.title: 09TOURISM
page.content: The survey area is just far enough away from the sea to escape from being dominated by tourism, but it certainly has its impact. Many of the farms and houses well situated for the passing traffic offer Bed and Breakfast. Some properties have been converted for the holiday trade for holiday lettings. In high summer caravans can be seen in some fields, but it is at The Mounts that the only real camping and caravan site, with full facilities, is to be found, alongside the busy Totnes to Kingsbridge road. Many people seem to prefer the rather quieter inland to the busy coastal area further to the south; there are fewer crowds and the village life is still comparatively unaffected, while there is the beautiful wooded Avon valley for walks and relaxation.
